attributes.action: Defer council tax for the everyone. Coronavirus (COVID-19)
attributes.additional_details:
So many people are so worried regarding the bills they have to pay. Council tax is one of the main ones. Their pay will be restricted. 
So why don’t our local council defer our council tax for the next 8 + weeks.
They can add it to the 8 weeks grace we have in February and  March 2021.i am sure this will help so many family’s out while the uncertainty of the next weeks unfold.
attributes.background: Local council should defer council tax untill the  Coronavirus (COVID-19). Has passed.

rejection.details:
We also need a petitioner's full name to be able to publish their petition.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
